verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-upon שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים <WH7799> sho-shan-Nim upon Shoshannim לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni Save אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; me O God כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for בָ֖אוּ <WH935> Va-'u are come מַ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim for the waters עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> Na-fesh. in unto [my] soul

טָבַ֤עְתִּי׀ <WH2883> ta-Va'-ti I sink בִּיוֵ֣ן <WH3121> bi-Ven mire מְ֭צוּלָה <WH4688> Me-tzu-lah in deep וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there מָעֳמָ֑ד <WH4613> mo-'o-Mad; where [there is] no standing בָּ֥אתִי <WH935> Ba-ti I am come בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> ve-ma-'a-mak-kei- into deep מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, waters וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת <WH7641> ve-shib-Bo-let where the floods שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃ <WH7857> she-ta-Fa-te-ni. overflow

יָגַ֣עְתִּי <WH3021> ya-Ga'-ti I am weary בְקָרְאִי֮ <WH7121> ve-ka-re-'I of my crying נִחַ֪ר <WH2787> ni-Char is dried גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י <WH1627> ge-Ro-Ni my throat כָּל֥וּ <WH3615> ka-Lu fail עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל <WH3176> me-ya-Chel, while I wait לֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> le-lo-Hai. for my God

רַבּ֤וּ׀ <WH7231> rab-Bu are more מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת <WH8185> mis-sa-'a-Rot than the hairs רֹאשִׁי֮ <WH7218> ro-Shi of mine head שֹׂנְאַ֪י <WH8130> so-ne-'Ai They that hate חִ֫נָּ֥ם <WH2600> chin-Nam me without a cause עָצְמ֣וּ <WH6105> 'a-tze-Mu are mighty מַ֭צְמִיתַי <WH6789> Matz-mi-tai they that would destroy אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> 'o-ye-Vai me [being] mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> She-ker; wrongfully אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher What לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי <WH1497> ga-Zal-ti, [that] which I took not away אָ֣ז <WH227> 'az then אָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7725> 'a-Shiv. then I restored

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, O God אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah who יָ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> Ya-da'-ta thou knowest לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י <WH200> le-'iv-val-Ti; my foolishness וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י <WH819> ve-'ash-mo-Tai, and my sins מִמְּךָ֥ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha at לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- are not נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <WH3582> nich-Cha-du. are not hid

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu be ashamed בִ֨י׀ vi קֹוֶיךָ֮ <WH6960> koei-Cha Let not them that wait אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai on thee O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD צְבָ֫א֥וֹת <WH6635> tze-Va-'ot of hosts אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יִכָּ֣לְמוּ <WH3637> yik-Kal-mu thee be confounded בִ֣י vi מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ <WH1245> me-vak-Shei-cha; for my sake let not those that seek אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei, for my sake O God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Because עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> 'A-lei-cha your sake נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti Because for thy sake I have borne חֶרְפָּ֑ה <WH2781> cher-Pah; reproach כִּסְּתָ֖ה <WH3680> kis-se-Tah hath covered כְלִמָּ֣ה <WH3639> che-lim-Mah shame פָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> fa-Nai. my face

מ֭וּזָר <WH2114> Mu-zor I am become a stranger הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have לְאֶחָ֑י <WH251> le-'e-Chai; unto my brethren וְ֝נָכְרִ֗י <WH5237> ve-na-che-Ri, and an alien לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> liv-Nei children אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> 'im-Mi. unto my mother's

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For קִנְאַ֣ת <WH7068> kin-'At For the zeal בֵּיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> bei-te-Cha of thine house אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי <WH398> 'a-cha-La-te-ni; hath eaten me up וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת <WH2781> ve-cher-Pot and the reproaches ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ <WH2778> chor-Fei-cha, of them that reproached נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> na-fe-Lu thee are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. and

וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה <WH1058> va-'ev-Keh When I wept בַצּ֣וֹם <WH6685> vatz-Tzom with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; [and chastened] my soul וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi became לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת <WH2781> la-cha-ra-Fot that was to my reproach לִֽי׃ Li.

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> va-'et-te-Nah I made לְבוּשִׁ֣י <WH3830> le-vu-Shi also my garment שָׂ֑ק <WH8242> Sak; sackcloth וָאֱהִ֖י <WH1961> va-'e-Hi became לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> la-Hem like לְמָשָֽׁל׃ <WH4912> le-ma-Shal. and I became a proverb

יָשִׂ֣יחוּ <WH7878> ya-Si-chu speak בִ֭י vi יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> Yo-she-vei They that sit in שָׁ֑עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar; the gate וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת <WH5058> u-ne-gi-Not, against me and I [was] the song שׁוֹתֵ֥י <WH8354> sho-Tei assuredly שֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> she-Char. strong drink

וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> va-'a-Ni Me תְפִלָּתִֽי־ <WH8605> te-fil-la-ti- But as for me my prayer לְךָ֨׀ le-Cha יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [is] unto thee O LORD עֵ֤ת <WH6256> 'et time רָצ֗וֹן <WH7522> ra-Tzon, [in] an acceptable אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God בְּרָב־ <WH7230> be-rov- in the multitude חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> chas-De-cha; of thy mercy עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni, hear בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> be-'e-Met me in the truth יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃ <WH3468> yish-'E-cha. of thy salvation

הַצִּילֵ֣נִי <WH5337> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מִ֭טִּיט <WH2916> Mit-tit me out of the mire וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not אֶטְבָּ֑עָה <WH2883> 'et-Ba-'ah; and let me not sink אִנָּצְלָ֥ה <WH5337> 'in-na-tze-Lah let me be delivered מִ֝שֹּֽׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> mis-so-ne-'Ai, from them that hate וּמִמַּֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> u-mi-ma-'a-mak-kei- me and out of the deep מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. waters

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- Nor תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי׀ <WH7857> tish-te-Fe-ni overflow שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <WH7641> shib-Bo-let branch מַ֭יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of water וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- Nor תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי <WH1104> tiv-la-'E-ni swallow me up מְצוּלָ֑ה <WH4688> me-tzu-Lah; me neither let the deep וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- Nor תֶּאְטַר־ <WH332> te'-tar- shut עָלַ֖י <WH5921> 'a-Lai and בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> be-'Er and let not the pit פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> Pi-ha. her mouth

וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> tas-Ter And hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <WH6440> Pa-nei-cha not thy face מֵֽעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> me-'av-De-cha; from thy servant כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- I am in צַר־ <WH6887> tzar- for I am in trouble לִ֝֗י Li, מַהֵ֥ר <WH4118> ma-Her me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> 'a-Ne-ni. hear

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta, Thou hast known חֶרְפָּתִ֣י <WH2781> cher-pa-Ti my reproach וּ֭בָשְׁתִּי <WH1322> U-va-she-ti and my shame וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י <WH3639> u-che-lim-ma-Ti; and my dishonour נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ <WH5048> neg-de-cha, are before כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <WH6887> tzor-Rai. mine adversaries

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nu They gave בְּבָרוּתִ֣י <WH1267> be-va-ru-Ti for my meat רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7219> Rosh; me also gall וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י <WH6772> ve-litz-ma-'I, and in my thirst יַשְׁק֥וּנִי <WH8248> yash-Ku-ni to drink חֹֽמֶץ׃ <WH2558> Cho-metz. they gave me vinegar

יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> ye-hi- become שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם <WH7979> shul-cha-Nam Let their table לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem before לְפָ֑ח <WH6341> le-Fach; become a snare וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים <WH7965> ve-lish-lo-Mim them and [that which should have been] for [their] welfare לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> le-mo-Kesh. [let it become] a trap
